note:
Hi, I'm Aaron Parecki,  co-founder of
IndieWebCamp.
I maintain oauth.net, write and consult about OAuth, and
am the editor of several W3C specifications. I help people learn about video production and livestreaming and dabble in product design.

I've been tracking my location since 2008 and I wrote 100 songs in 100 days.
I've spoken at conferences around the world about
owning your data,
OAuth,
quantified self,
and explained why R is a vowel. Read more.
name: Aaron Parecki

content.html:
I have no reason to leave twitter because my twitter is already just a shadow copy of my website, but if you want to find me elsewhere, you can follow me from Mastodon and micro.blog and others:

https://aaronparecki.com/aaronpk

https://micro.blog/aaronpk

content.html: so... @AlaskaAir recently redesigned the exterior paint of their planes, and now most of the stock footage on StoryBlocks is out of date. But I'm noticing some other stock websites have more up to date clips. what's going on?
content.value: so... @AlaskaAir recently redesigned the exterior paint of their planes, and now most of the stock footage on StoryBlocks is out of date. But I'm noticing some other stock websites have more up to date clips. what's going on?

content.html:
October is cybersecurity awareness month.

Okta is a cybersecurity company.

...coincidence...?
content.value: October is cybersecurity awareness month.  Okta is a cybersecurity company.  ...coincidence...?

content.html: why are there always too many lens cleaning cloths when you don't need them and not enough when you're actually looking for them??
content.value: why are there always too many lens cleaning cloths when you don't need them and not enough when you're actually looking for them??

content.html:
Today I worked on budget spreadsheets, planned out all of next year's travel, went grocery shopping at two different stores, restocked the pantry, emptied the dishwasher, and cleaned the sink.

When do I get my adulting trophy?
content.value: Today I worked on budget spreadsheets, planned out all of next year's travel, went grocery shopping at two different stores, restocked the pantry, emptied the dishwasher, and cleaned the sink.   When do I get my adulting trophy?

content.html:
I had no idea these "time since last opened" pill caps were a thing and also so cheap, and now I want to make these for all sorts of different reminders, like

• when did I last feed the cat?
• when did I last pump up my bike tires?
content.value: I had no idea these "time since last opened" pill caps were a thing and also so cheap, and now I want to make these for all sorts of different reminders, like  • when did I last feed the cat? • when did I last pump up my bike tires?

content.html:
For the past month, I've had a fragment of a song stuck in my head, and haven't been able to figure out where it's from. The Foundation theme reminds me of it.

Finally, tonight, I remembered it's from a bizarre Swedish commercial I saw years ago.

https://youtu.be/-zCqA483mcg
content.value: For the past month, I've had a fragment of a song stuck in my head, and haven't been able to figure out where it's from. The Foundation theme reminds me of it.  Finally, tonight, I remembered it's from a bizarre Swedish commercial I saw years ago.  https://youtu.be/-zCqA483mcg

content.html: I just got to scare the crap out of some kids who were climbing around my construction site by triggering a 12v siren from Home Assistant, and watched the whole thing on the remote camera feed! It was oddly satisfying, and I hope they get the message not to come back.
content.value: I just got to scare the crap out of some kids who were climbing around my construction site by triggering a 12v siren from Home Assistant, and watched the whole thing on the remote camera feed! It was oddly satisfying, and I hope they get the message not to come back.

content.html: I just finished downloading my whole Flickr account to a static website. Now browsing around it is much faster than looking at the same photos on Flickr, and it makes me want to get back to actually organizing my photos again!
content.value: I just finished downloading my whole Flickr account to a static website. Now browsing around it is much faster than looking at the same photos on Flickr, and it makes me want to get back to actually organizing my photos again!

content.html:
It's here! The PK1 desktop stand for the YoloLiv Instream vertical livestreaming box! The stand holds the Instream at the perfect angle to use it on your desk! Now you don't have to awkwardly mount it from the side on a tripod, or have it laying flat!

Shipping now! https://pk1.tv/pk1-instream-stand/

content.html: I just discovered that a gliding club in New Zealand wrote software to receive the GPS data that my iOS app collects and they recommend it on their website for tracking flights! https://gliding.co.nz/overland-for-iphone-setup/
content.value: I just discovered that a gliding club in New Zealand wrote software to receive the GPS data that my iOS app collects and they recommend it on their website for tracking flights! https://gliding.co.nz/overland-for-iphone-setup/

content.html:
Hello internet friends!

What is the best way to share a set of photos with a select few people, while being able to add more photos over an extended period of time? Must not rely on creating an account like on iCloud.

I have my own thoughts but I am interested in other ideas!
content.value: Hello internet friends!   What is the best way to share a set of photos with a select few people, while being able to add more photos over an extended period of time? Must not rely on creating an account like on iCloud.  I have my own thoughts but I am interested in other ideas!

name: at Rogue Valley International - Medford Airport (MFR)
